channel.title: Npc Problem - Look
channel.description: Ok let's say i got 40 npcs in my server and they all hit back pretty good when your fighting them, but then let's say i add 20 more..and now none of them hit at all just 0's all the time. Anyone know how to fix this? So that they hit again.

item.title: Npc Problem - Look
item.dc:creator: @Wildwolf Wildwolf
item.description:
@Wildwolf wrote:

try configuring the damage to each npc?
look at each npc file and you will find the npc’s damage or something
this is in geral terms, because I don’t really know how to fix it.
But if i could look at one bugged npc file, i could tlel u where the problem is.

Read full topic
